1.name: Master Ball
1.flavor_text: The best BALL that catches a POKéMON without fail.
1.effect: Catches a wild Pokémon every time.

2.name: Ultra Ball
2.flavor_text: A better BALL with a higher catch rate than a GREAT BALL.
2.effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 2×.

3.name: Great Ball
3.flavor_text: A good BALL with a higher catch rate than a POKé BALL.
3.effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 1.5×.

4.name: Poke Ball
4.flavor_text: A tool used for catching wild POKéMON.
4.effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.

5.name: Safari Ball
5.flavor_text: A special BALL that is used only in the SAFARI ZONE.
5.effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon in the Great Marsh or Safari Zone.  Success rate is 1.5×.

6.name: Park Ball
6.flavor_text: A special Poké Ball for the Pal Park.
6.effect: Catches Pokémon in the Pal Park every time.

7.name: Sport Ball
7.flavor_text: A special Poké Ball for the Bug-Catching Contest.
7.effect: Tries to catch a Pokémon in the Bug-Catching contest in National Park. (Gen II: Park Ball)

12.name: Laheavy Ball
12.flavor_text: Doesn't fly far, but is more effective if the Pokémon hasn't noticed the player.

13.name: Laleaden Ball
13.flavor_text: Upgraded version of the Heavy Ball. Doesn't fly far, but is more effective if the Pokémon hasn't noticed the player.

14.name: Lagigaton Ball
14.flavor_text: Upgraded version of the Leaden Ball. Doesn't fly far, but is more effective if the Pokémon hasn't noticed the player.

15.name: Lafeather Ball
15.flavor_text: Can be thrown further than a regular Poké Ball. Is more effective for catching Pokémon that fly high in the air.

16.name: Lawing Ball
16.flavor_text: Can be thrown further than a Feather Ball. Is more effective for catching Pokémon that fly high in the air.

17.name: Lajet Ball
17.flavor_text: Can be thrown further than a Wing Ball. Is more effective for catching Pokémon that fly high in the air.

19.name: Net Ball
19.flavor_text: A BALL that works well on WATER- and BUG-type POKéMON.
19.effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 3× for water and bug Pokémon.

20.name: Dive Ball
20.flavor_text: A BALL that works better on POKéMON on the ocean floor.
20.effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 3.5× when underwater, fishing, or surfing.

21.name: Nest Ball
21.flavor_text: A BALL that works better on weaker POKéMON.
21.effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 3.9× for level 1 Pokémon, and drops steadily to 1× at level 30.

22.name: Repeat Ball
22.flavor_text: A BALL that works better on POKéMON caught before.
22.effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 3× for previously-caught Pokémon.

23.name: Timer Ball
23.flavor_text: More effective as more turns are taken in battle.
23.effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate increases by 0.1× (Gen V: 0.3×) every turn, to a max of 4×.

24.name: Luxury Ball
24.flavor_text: A cozy BALL that makes POKéMON more friendly.
24.effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Caught Pokémon start with 200 happiness.

25.name: Premier Ball
25.flavor_text: A rare BALL made in commemoration of some event.
25.effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.

26.name: Dusk Ball
26.flavor_text: A somewhat different Poké Ball that makes it easier to catch wild Pokémon at night or in dark places like caves.
26.effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 3.5× at night and in caves.

27.name: Heal Ball
27.flavor_text: A remedial Poké Ball that restores the caught Pokémon’s HP and eliminates any status problem.
27.effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Caught Pokémon are immediately healed.

28.name: Quick Ball
28.flavor_text: A somewhat different Poké Ball that provides a better catch rate if it is used at the start of a wild encounter.
28.effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 4× (Gen V: 5×), but only on the first turn.

29.name: Cherish Ball
29.flavor_text: A quite rare Poké Ball that has been specially crafted to commemorate an occasion of some sort.
29.effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.

30.name: Dream Ball
30.flavor_text: A special Poké Ball that appears out of nowhere in a bag at the Entree Forest. It can catch any Pokémon.
30.effect: Catches Pokémon found in the Dream World.

31.name: Beast Ball
31.flavor_text: A special Poké Ball designed to catch Ultra Beasts. It has a low success rate for catching others.
31.effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 5× for Ultra Beasts and 0.1× for all other Pokémon.

32.name: Lure Ball
32.flavor_text: A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon hooked by a Rod when fishing.
32.effect: 3× effectiveness while fishing. Made from Blu Apricorn.

33.name: Level Ball
33.flavor_text: A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon that are a lower level than your own.
33.effect: Success rate based off of fraction target Pokémon is of user’s Pokémon. Made from Red Apricorn.

34.name: Moon Ball
34.flavor_text: A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon that evolve using the Moon Stone.
34.effect: 4× effectiveness on familes of Pokémon with a Moon Stone evolution. Made from Ylw Apricorn.

35.name: Heavy Ball
35.flavor_text: A Poké Ball for catching very heavy Pokémon.
35.effect: Has flat bonus or penalty to catch rate depending on weight class of target. Made from Blk Apricorn.

36.name: Fast Ball
36.flavor_text: A Poké Ball that makes it easier to catch fast Pokémon.
36.effect: 4× effectiveness on Pokémon with 100 or greater base speed. (Gen II: Roaming or Fleeing Pokémon). Made from Wht Apricorn.

37.name: Friend Ball
37.flavor_text: A Poké Ball that makes caught Pokémon more friendly.
37.effect: Caught Pokémon start with 200 happiness. Made from Grn Apricorn.

38.name: Love Ball
38.flavor_text: Poké Ball for catching Pokémon that are the opposite gender of your Pokémon.
38.effect: 8× effectiveness on opposite sex, same species targets of the Active Pokémon. Made from Pnk Apricorn.
